at.qe.timeguess.controllers

Class UserController

  • java.lang.Object
    • at.qe.timeguess.controllers.UserController

  • @RequestMapping(value="/users")
 @RestController
public class UserController
extends Object
    Class that handles the user endpoint of the API. It takes care of the authentication and registration of users and handles creating, modifying, searching and deleting users.

      UserController()

    • Method Detail

      • login

        @PostMapping(value="/login")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> login(@RequestBody
                                                                                     Login login)
        Method that returns a JWT Token needed for authorization upon successful login.
        Parameters:
        login - DTO that contains username and password
        Returns:
        ResponseEntity: Status 401 when wrong credentials are entered, Status 200 with LoginResult DTO when login was successful

      • register

        @PostMapping(value="/register")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> register(@RequestBody
                                                                                           Login login)
        Method that registers a new user and assigns the role player to it
        Parameters:
        login - DTO that contains username and password
        Returns:
        ResponseEntity: 201 if user could be created, 409 if a user with the same username already exists

      • getUser

        @GetMapping(value="/{id}")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> getUser(@PathVariable
                                                                                     Long id)
        Returns the user with the given id.
        Parameters:
        id - number that represents the id of a user
        Returns:
        200 and User entity without password and timestamp on success, 404 when user couldn't be found

      • putUser

        @PutMapping(value="/{id}")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> putUser(@PathVariable
                                                                                     Long id,
                                                                                     @RequestBody
                                                                                     UpdateUserDTO updateUserDTO)
        Method that changes a user if the authenticated user has the right permissions to modify a user and modify it's role. Only admins can change other users than themselves and are to only ones allowed to change the role of a user. A non admin user can only change his password and username and needs to verify himself with his current password.
        Parameters:
        id - number that represents the id of a user
        updateUserDTO - DTO that contains the changed values of the user and its current password
        Returns:
        ResponseEntity: 200 when user could be changed successfully, 400 wrong old password or empty password was given 403 when the user hadn't the permissions to change a user, 404 user with specified user id doesn't exist, 409 if new username is the same as a username of an existing user or user is in game

      • deleteUser

        @PreAuthorize(value="hasAuthority(\'ADMIN\')")
 @DeleteMapping(value="/{id}")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity deleteUser(@PathVariable
                                                                                                                                        Long id)
        Method that deletes a user with the specified id. Only admins are allowed to delete users.
        Parameters:
        id - number that represent the id of the to be deleted user
        Returns:
        ResponseEntity: 200 if user could be deleted, 404 if user couldn't be found, 409 if user is ingame

      • getUsers

        @PreAuthorize(value="hasAuthority(\'ADMIN\')")
 @GetMapping
public List<User> getUsers()
        Returns a list of all users. Only admins are allowed to call this method.
        Returns:
        list of users

      • createUser

        @PreAuthorize(value="hasAuthority(\'ADMIN\')")
 @PostMapping
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> createUser(@RequestBody
                                                                                                                          CreateUserDTO createUserDTO)
        Creates a user with the specified username, password and role. Only admins are allowed to create users.
        Parameters:
        createUserDTO - DTO that contains username, password and role
        Returns:
        ResponseEntity: 201 if user could be created, 400 if missing parameters or empty password, 409 if there already exists a user with the same password

      • searchUsers

        @GetMapping(value="search/{username}")
public List<String> searchUsers(@PathVariable
                                                                       String username)
        Method searches users by username based on the given search parameter.
        Parameters:
        username - string that is used to search usernames
        Returns:
        a list of usernames that match search pattern

      • isUserInGame

        @PreAuthorize(value="hasAuthority(\'ADMIN\')")
 @GetMapping(value="/{id}/ingame")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> isUserInGame(@PathVariable
                                                                                                                                                 Long id)

      • isAuthenticated

        @GetMapping(value="/auth")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> isAuthenticated()
        Returns an ok response code if user is authenticated.
        Returns:
        401 if user not authenticated, 200 if user authenticated
